data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 27458, Version Hash: 394e57a0df0adfba5607067b3d2e4513ac45d578
data.actual_result: The "Discord Revolution" arrows in the keybind menu get "stuck" and you have to reopen the menu to use them again.
data.expected_result: They are supposed to continue making sounds and lighting up as usual as you press the arrow keys.
data.short_description: The interactable arrow keys on the CTRL+/ menu get "stuck" if you open the help menu and go back.
